scripts.start: concurrently -n "server,liquidator,web,price-pooler,price-to-frontend,worker" -c "green,blue,magenta,yellow,cyan,red"        "npm run start --workspace=server"        "npm run start --workspace=liquidator"        "npm run start --workspace=web"        "npm run start --workspace=price-pooler"        "npm run start --workspace=price-to-frontend"        "npm run start --workspace=add-price-to-db"
